channel.title: vim on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Just a Memo

item.title: Sed
item.description: Sed Reference Directory Recursively $ find ./ -type f -exec sed -i -e 's/:1313//g' {} \; $ find ./ -type f -exec sed -i -e 's/192\.168\.0\.199/laowalter.github.io/g' {} \; Search and Replace $ sed -i 's/^tag/tags/g' Search in matched $ echo apple1 apple3 apple1 apple2 botemo1 | sed '/apple./ { s/apple1/apple2/g; }'

item.title: Vim Cheatsheet
item.description: Vim 全局 :saveas file - 另存为 :close - 关闭当前窗口 K - open man page for word under the cursor H - 移动到当前页面顶部 M - 移动到当前页面中间 L - 移动到当前页面底部 w - 移动到下个单词开

item.title: VIM
item.description: Vim BundleUpdate 之后出现的问题 YcM(YouCompleteMe) server 启动失败 解决办法重新执行install.py cd ~/.vim/bundle/YouCompleteMe ./install.py 使用技巧 文件编码 :set fenc=gbk :set fenc=utf-8 DOS UNIX 转换 set ff=unix Swap character xp Xp Global Replace, $ says “put vim in last-line mode”. :1,$s/George Bush/Barack Obama/g
